name: babls!!
description:
A  silly turn-based puzzle about soap bubbles cleaning up, with grand total of 14 levels — some of those are quite challenging though! CREATE A BUBBLE EMPIRE OF YOUR OWN AND BECOME THE LORD OF CLEANLINESS.

How to play:
— You have to clean up all the dirt in a limited amount of moves
— Your actions apply to every bubble on the screen
— You use arrow keys to move and WASD (or space + arrow) to duplicate
— When you duplicate, you use one move for every bubble you have
— Bubbles get destroyed upon colliding with each other, level boundaries, or blue block
— Red blocks push bubbles back

The game does not save your progress after closing.

To return to level selection, press Backspace.
You can swap arrows & WASD functions by pressing Tab.

keichi4 — Design, Programming
Maxim Panchenko — Audio (mfire.panchenko@gmail.com)
